STILLER





Stiller: You better tell your friends not to ruin this. I want=
ed a fair fight and those bastards are ruining it!...



(Stiller tries to =
knee Arrow in the face...)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulsti=
ce Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 7:0=
2 PM
  Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


  Arrow ducks t=
he palm and steps right into Termitron's shots meant for Stiller. He's hit =
by them in the back and goes down to one knee.

  Burning Hammer stares at =
Perplex is stasis lock while everyone yelled "save Trinity!" He shakes his =
head...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwr=
pg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 6:08 PM
    Subject: =
Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


    STILLER




    (Stiller is=
 headbutted in the face. He bends over some, wiping mech fluid from his fac=
e. Then he springs up, thrusting the palm of his hand upwards at Arrow's fa=
ce...)

  =

hit but quickly recovers and actually tries to headbutt Stiller...

   =

er nods and Arrow approaches Stiller...

sage -----

ogroups.com

rrow...)

 PM
                    Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash
=


                    STILLER





                    (Stiller smiles and =
puts his crossbow in it's holster. He clutches his fists and stares at Arro=
w.. He wanted a fist fight. Stiller motions for Arrow to come...)

        =
              ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: Sou=
lstice Omega

ect: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


                      Arro=
w ducks the arrow (heehee) and fires back 7 shots at Stiller...

Orchid*

ject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


                        M=
CGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP





             =
           (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fires a missile at Ni=
ghtlight.)



                        (Barrymore takes one of the energy ba=
lls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fires 6 laser b=
eams at Nightlight.)



                        (Depp is struck by both ene=
rgy balls, taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 shots at Nightlig=
ht.)



                        (Alba ducks the energy balls and pulls a pi=
n from a grenade and throws it in front of the Chivtron base.)



         =
               (Stiller growls and fires an arrow at Arrow.)



           =
             (Lee fires a ball of fire at Nightlight's legs, attempting to =
trip her up.)



                        (Virgo fires a red energy draining=
 dart at Nightlight...)
